voice_instruct: A young woman in her early twenties with a shifting, unstable voice. Three distinct registers: Shallan is bright and witty, Veil is low and streetwise, Radiant is measured and commanding. The voice shifts between these three without warning. Playful surface hiding deep fractures.

tracks.title: What I Did at Eleven
tracks.prompt: dark art rock, shifting female vocals, piano and distorted strings, Bjork meets Radiohead, Eb minor, 70 BPM, childhood horror
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I was eleven when my mother tried to kill me in the dark
she said I was corrupting, she said I carried a mark
she had a knife, my mother had a knife, her hand was on my arm
and I reached for something underneath the panic and the harm

Pattern was already there, I did not know his name
a cryptic spren who bonded me before I understood the game
I summoned a Blade at eleven years old, I summoned it and struck
and my mother fell and my father saw and the whole house came unstuck

[chorus]
I killed my mother, that is the secret underneath
the one I buried so deep that even I could not breathe
I killed my mother and my father took the blame
and I split myself in three so I would never feel the same

[verse 2]
father covered for me, told the world he did the deed
he wore the murderer's name like a coat, he wore it like a creed
and I watched him change, the sorrow turned to sickness, turned to fists
he hit my brothers, drank the wine, and I drew pictures in the mist

Testament, my first spren, she went deadeye when I broke the oath
I forgot her, I forgot I had a Blade, I forgot the growth
and Pattern came later, patient Pattern, who loves lies
he said mmm at my every deception like a scholar who keeps no ties

[bridge]
the truth is a series of doors and I have locked them all
each one holds a memory that would burn me if it falls
I am Shallan, I am Veil, I am Radiant, I am none
I am the girl who killed her mother before she was anyone

[chorus]
I killed my mother, that is the secret underneath
the one I buried so deep that even I could not breathe
I killed my mother and my father took the blame
and I split myself in three so I would never feel the same

tracks.title: Veil
tracks.prompt: smoky trip-hop, low female vocals, heavy bass, vinyl crackle, Portishead meets Massive Attack, Bb minor, 74 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Veil wears a hat and a coat and a lie
she walks the underbelly of Urithiru like a spy
the Ghostbloods gave her missions and she played them like a hand
because Shallan could not walk in shadow, Shallan could not stand

[chorus]
I am the mask she wears when the truth is too bright
I am the woman in the tavern in the middle of the night
I am not real, I know I am not real
but I am the only one of us who lets herself feel

[verse 2]
Mraize watched me with those scarred eyes, the Ghostblood hunter
he collected trophies from across the cosmere, one from every wonder
and I played double agent, Veil against the world
while Shallan drew her pictures and Radiant stood unfurled

[bridge]
Shallan thinks she made me up, she thinks I am the mask
but maybe I am the honest one, maybe she is the task

[chorus]
I am the mask she wears when the truth is too bright
I am the woman in the tavern in the middle of the night
I am not real, I know I am not real
but I am the only one of us who lets herself feel

tracks.title: Radiant
tracks.prompt: commanding art pop, strong female vocals, martial drums, clean synths, Florence and the Machine meets Kate Bush, C minor, 78 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Radiant stands where Shallan crumbles and where Veil would crawl
she wears the discipline like Shardplate, she does not fall

[chorus]
I am the armor and the armor has no heart
I am the version that was built to never fall apart
but armor without a body is just metal in a room
and I am starting to suspect that I am Shallan's tomb

[verse 2]
Adolin sees through all three of us, that is why she loves him
he calls her Shallan when she is pretending to be prim

[bridge]
the integration is not a death, it is a coming home
Radiant does not disappear, she settles in the bone

[chorus]
I am the armor and the armor has no heart
I am the version that was built to never fall apart
but armor without a body is just metal in a room
and I am starting to suspect that I am Shallan's tomb

tracks.title: Pattern
tracks.prompt: glitchy art rock, female vocals with vocal processing, mathematical rhythms, Bjork meets Radiohead Kid A, F sharp minor, 72 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
mmm, he says, when I lie about my name
mmm, he says, when I pretend away the shame
a cryptic spren is attracted to the lie itself
the complexity of deception, the pattern on the shelf

[chorus]
Pattern, Pattern, you are the truth that feeds on lies
you bonded me because my self-deception was the prize
you needed someone fractured, someone layered, someone split
and I needed someone patient enough to sit

[verse 2]
but there was one before you, Pattern, there was Testament
a spren I bonded as a child and then abandoned in the rent
when I broke my oaths at eleven, she went deadeye, she went dead

[bridge]
mmm, he says, you are the most complex pattern I have seen
a lie so beautiful it built three people from a single dream

[chorus]
Pattern, Pattern, you are the truth that feeds on lies
you bonded me because my self-deception was the prize
you needed someone fractured, someone layered, someone split
and I needed someone patient enough to sit

tracks.title: Lightweaving
tracks.prompt: shimmering art rock, female vocals, layered harmonics, Cocteau Twins meets Talk Talk, A minor, 76 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I draw because if I stop drawing I will have to look
at what is real instead of what the stormlight took
Lightweaving is not just illusion, it is interpretation
I take the light and tell it what to be, a transformation

[chorus]
every drawing is a door I walk through sideways
every sketch is a confession in disguise
I draw the world the way it should have been
and somewhere in the light the truth survives

[verse 2]
I drew the Chasmfiend for Jasnah's research, every leg precise
I drew Adolin in Shardplate standing like a cornerstone
but the drawings I keep hidden are the ones that matter most
my mother's face, my father's hands, the memories I host

[bridge]
stormlight bends to the shape of what I believe
and what I believe is that beauty can hold what I grieve

[chorus]
every drawing is a door I walk through sideways
every sketch is a confession in disguise
I draw the world the way it should have been
and somewhere in the light the truth survives

tracks.title: The Ghostbloods
tracks.prompt: dark trip-hop spy thriller, female vocals, menacing bass, Massive Attack meets Portishead, D minor, 74 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Mraize has a chicken from another world perched on his shoulder
an Aviar, he calls it, a trophy from a cosmere hunt
the Ghostbloods recruited me through Tyn, who died for the mistake
of thinking I was just a lighteyes scholar on the take

[chorus]
the Ghostbloods see the cosmere like a map of trade routes
Investiture is the currency, the Shards are the disputes
and I am in the middle holding secrets from all sides
telling truths to liars and lying where the truth resides

[verse 2]
Thaidakar runs the Ghostbloods from a world I cannot name
a man who cannot die, they say, a lord of shadow and of flame
I said I would not serve them, I said I would not be their tool

[bridge]
but I took what they taught me, the cosmere awareness
the knowledge that Roshar is one world in a sea
because the best lie is the one that sets you free

[chorus]
the Ghostbloods see the cosmere like a map of trade routes
Investiture is the currency, the Shards are the disputes
and I am in the middle holding secrets from all sides
telling truths to liars and lying where the truth resides

tracks.title: Testament
tracks.prompt: haunting sparse art rock, female vocals breaking, solo piano and distortion, Radiohead meets PJ Harvey, G minor, 66 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I found her in Shadesmar, standing in the market with dead eyes
a deadeye cryptic, geometric patterns gone to ties
of nothing, empty nothing, and the traders walked on by
Testament, my first bond, my first oath, my first forsaking

[chorus]
Testament, I am sorry is not large enough a word
I am sorry is a whisper and your silence is a sword
you gave me a Blade when I was a child and I used it in the dark
and then I forgot you existed and that is the cruelest mark

[verse 2]
the Shardblade I thought was my father's, the one hidden in the safe
that was Testament, a dead Blade, screaming when I held the hilt
Adolin looked at her the way he looks at Maya
with a gentleness that says even the broken deserve a prayer

[bridge]
Pattern is my bond now but Testament is my debt
and I will carry both because I am not finished yet

[chorus]
Testament, I am sorry is not large enough a word
I am sorry is a whisper and your silence is a sword
you gave me a Blade when I was a child and I used it in the dark
and then I forgot you existed and that is the cruelest mark

tracks.title: I Am Shallan
tracks.prompt: triumphant art rock finale, female vocals gaining clarity, full band, Florence and the Machine meets Kate Bush meets Bjork, D major, 78 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Veil sits at the bar and Radiant stands at the door
and Shallan is somewhere between them, standing on the floor
I am the girl who drew flowers while her father hit her brothers
I am the spy who played the Ghostbloods like a hand of cards

[chorus]
I am Shallan, I am finally just Shallan
the wit is mine, the grit is mine, the grief is mine, the plan
the lightweaving and the lying and the drawing and the dark
I am Shallan and I hold the whole of it, every single spark

[verse 2]
Adolin stands in the doorway with his stupid perfect grin
Pattern hums approval, mmm, this is the most beautiful truth
and Testament, somewhere in the Cognitive, stirs her empty gaze

[bridge]
I was eleven when I shattered, I was twenty when I healed
not healed like the wound is gone but healed like the wound is sealed
with light, with truth, with the understanding that the three
were always one, were always me, were always free

[chorus]
I am Shallan, I am finally just Shallan
the wit is mine, the grit is mine, the grief is mine, the plan
the lightweaving and the lying and the drawing and the dark
I am Shallan and I hold the whole of it, every single spark

[outro]
three girls walk into a room
and one girl walks out
and she is smiling
because the drawing she holds in her hand
is the first one she has ever drawn of herself
